ygData.subject: Re: Studs and Bonding
ygData.msgSnippet: For the steel boning it takes 1 file 1 small brick (block) of ore and 1 water flask. ... From: McConnell, Jeff  To:
ygData.messageBody:
For the steel boning it takes 1 file 1 small brick (block) of ore and 1
water flask.
-----Original Message-----
